job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Terminus is the only accountbased engagement platform built to deliver more pipeline and revenue through multichannel accountbased marketing ABM The platform Terminus Engagement Hub connects the first and thirdparty data needed to understand both customers and prospects with the most robust suite of engagement channelsincluding ads chat email and webavailable Terminus powers multichannel ABM for thousands of brands globally including DHL G2 Outreach and TripActions Terminus is proud to be a G2 leader in ABM for 13 consecutive quarters Visit terminuscom to learn more or connect with us on Twitter and LinkedIn ltbrgtltbrgtTerminus is seeking an accomplished ltstronggtSoftware Engineerltstronggt to help us build an industry leading AccountBased Marketing platform that allows B2B marketers to do ABM at scale This role will be pivotal in helping our teams build scale and deliver bestinclass ABM platform on the market to our customers This will include working with thirdparty data and integrations ETL jobs our data platform as well as a variety of our other services which require experience in but not limited to APIs messaging and automationltbrgtltbrgtMost importantly we are looking for engineers that exemplify our core values positive supportive and selfstarting Like us we want you to be excited every day about working with this team and building great software We are passionate about delivering highquality code and providing our customers with features that they need and loveltbrgtltbrgtAs a fast growing startup Terminus offers an incredible opportunity for a senior software engineer to learn grow personally and professionally and be part of building our company and cultureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtWrite and review services coded in Go primarily Python Typescript Ruby Java and other languagesframeworks as necessaryltligtltligtDesign and implement large scale data solutionsltligtltligtDeploy highvolume services to production multiple times per dayltligtltligtMaintain infrastructureascode in an AWS environment We use TerraformltligtltligtInstrument code to provide visibility into performance and reliabilityltligtltligtDocument service designarchitecture and participate in design reviewsltligtltligtMaintain operations by measuring and monitoring availability latency and overall system healthltligtltligtWork with Support to triage and debug customer and product issuesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt2 years of professional software experience in one or more of the following Go C C Java C or Rubyltligtltligt2 years experience running production systems on a major cloud providerltligtltligtExperience in building maintaining and monitoring distributed services and systemsltligtltligtExperience with RPCRESTful API designltligtltligtExperience in multiple database designs relational document graphltligtltligtExperience with Microservices architectureltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred Experience With The FollowingltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtAWSltligtltligtDesigning and developing public APIsltligtltligtDocker in a production environmentltligtltligtExperience with big data technology eg Spark Hive etcltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtIncredible Benefits Incredible CompanyltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtGuaranteed participation in our equity program  because our employees should share in our successltligtltligtUnlimited vacation to unplug and recharge however you chooseltligtltligtHalfDay Fridays to reward you for your productivityltligtltligt2 days paid VTO volunteer time off every year
